business.headline: Income tax deadline: Only 3 days left to pay last instalment of advance taxMaking timely payments is crucial when it comes to tax compliance to avoid penalties and interest. Also, meeting deadlines ensures last-minute stress and a smooth tax filing process.

Wall Street on edge: Inflation eases, but global retaliation hits stocks hardAfter jumping to a big early gain on an encouraging inflation update, Wall Street gave back much of it after other countries announced their retaliations following President Donald Trump's latest escalation in his trade war.

Wall Street opens higher as softer inflation data boosts investor confidenceAt the opening bell, the S&P 500 rose 52.8 points, or 0.95%, to 5,624.84 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up by 144.0 points, or 0.35%, to 41,577.5. The Nasdaq Composite also witnessed a rise of 275.3 points, or 1.58%, to 17,711.41.
Equity mutual fund inflows fall 26% in February amid market volatilityMarket fluctuations impacted mutual fund inflows across categories, with equity and hybrid funds seeing a decline.

Retail inflation eases to 7-month low of 3.61% in FebruaryRetail inflation in February has cooled to a seven-month low, and it has also fallen below the RBI's medium-term target for the first time in six months.
TDS rules from April 1: Higher tax-free limits on FD interest, lotteryTo benefit senior citizens, the government has doubled the TDS threshold for interest income from Rs 50,000 to Rs 1 lakh.

Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower as IT stocks tumble; Infosys falls over 4%The S&P BSE Sensex ended 72.56 points lower at 74,029.76, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 27.40 points lower at 22,470.50. All the other broader market indices also ended in negative territory.

Temasek takes a bit of Haldiram's, buys 10% stake for $1 billion: ReportTemasek, which has already invested in Manipal Hospitals and fast-food giant Devyani International (operator of KFC and Pizza Hut in India), is now looking to cash in on the growing snacks market with its Haldiram's bet.

Air India rolls out premium economy fares starting at Rs 599 for a limited timeThese premium economy fares are above regular economy fares on domestic flights for a limited time. Prices vary based on routes and demand.

India's top 7 billionaires lose $34 billion amid stock market slumpMukesh Ambani, India's richest person, lost $3.13 billion this year, though he still remains India's richest man with a net worth of $87.5 billion.

Sensex falls over 400 points. 3 factors behind today's stock market slumpStock market today: At around 12:42 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 439.77 points to 73,662.55 and the Nifty50 was trading 150.50 points lower at 22,347.40.

Why are some investors choosing fixed deposits over SIPs?Many stock market experts suggest that mid-cap and small-cap stocks are currently expensive, which has triggered a correction in the last six months.

entertainment.headline: Maui Police chief accused of covering up alleged Diddy, Odell Beckham Jr. assaultMaui Police Chief John Pelletier is accused of covering up an alleged gang rape involving Sean 'Diddy' Combs, Odell Beckham Jr, and Druski. The lawsuit claims Pelletier attempted to conceal the 2018 assault.

More photos from Prajakta Koli-Vrishank Khanal's Haldi out. Seen yet?Prajakta Koli's friend has shared more photos from her and Vrishank Khanal's Haldi ceremony on Instagram. Check out the pictures here.

Panchayat actor Durgesh Kumar 'struggling' despite hit projects, spending 25 yearsActor Durgesh Kumar, known for his roles in Panchayat and Laapataa Ladies, shared that he still struggles to find significant roles despite his success. He said that he still has to chase casting directors for audition despite recognition and spending 25 years in the industry.

TV actor Aditi Sharma responds to allegations of cheating from estranged husbandAditi Sharma refuted her estranged husband Abhineet Kaushik's allegations of infidelity, asserting that their marital issues stem from his insecurities and not her actions. She also claimed that she faced 'serious problems' in the four months of marriage.

Kim So-hyun's relationship with Kim Sae-ron confirmed by Dispatch. DetailsA news report by Dispatch shed light on the controversy surrounding Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron's alleged past relationship and the financial and emotional turmoil Kim Sae-ron faced, which might have led up to her tragic death.
K-pop group NMIXX makes a bold comeback with High HorseK-pop group NMIXX is making a bold comeback with High Horse. And this time, they have a surprise for their desi fans.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian search for their missing diamond at Ambani wedding. WatchIn the latest promo of The Kardashian Season 6, Kardashian sisters, Kim and Khloe, are seen panicking over their missing diamond as they attend the grand Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding in Mumbai.

TV actor Aditi Sharma's rumoured boyfriend breaks silence amid infidelity allegationApollena actor Aditi Sharma's co-star Samarthya Gupta has denied rumours of an affair with her, calling the allegations baseless and harmful. Aditi's husband had alleged infidelity.

Kim Sae-ron's unpublished statement emerges after dating rumours with Kim Soo-hyunAlmost a month after South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's death, her aunt has alleged K-drama star Kim Soo-hyun was in a relationship with Sae-ron, and that they began dating when she was only a minor.

Did Ekta Kapoor just take a jibe at Ram Kapoor in a video about Ozempic?Filmmaker Ekta Kapoor on Tuesday shared a video on Instagram in which she was seen talking about her weight gain and if she should follow artificial methods to lose some weight. There was also a Ram Kapoor connection.

Ibrahim Ali Khan re-posts Nadaaniyan's poor ratings, puzzled fans reactIbrahim Ali Khan reposted his film, Nadaaniyan's low ratings. Fans were puzzled by the actor's move in highlighting the film's poor performance.

Singer Ne-Yo introduces his four girlfriends from his polyamorous relationship In a candid revelation, American singer and songwriter Ne-Yo introduced his four girlfriends, embracing a polyamorous lifestyle. The musician shared insights into his unique relationship dynamic online, calling it his 'pyramid'.

Tapu-Sonu wedding in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah…? Fans say 'must be Bhide's dream'A promo of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah shows Tapu marrying Sonu, leaving fans in shock. Many speculate it's a dream sequence, as Bhide disapproves of Tapu. The sitcom, India's longest-running, first aired in 2008.

Exclusive: Louis Tomlinson on India debut, love for Indian food, and solo career Louis Tomlinson, former One Direction member, embarked on his first solo performance in India at Lollapalooza 2025. He expressed excitement and a fondness for Indian culture, particularly its cuisine, during an exclusive interview.

Telugu actor-politician Posani Krishna Murali granted bail in all casesActor and YSRCP member Posani Krishna Murali has been granted bail in all cases. The YSRCP accused Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu-led government of filing 17 cases against him as part of a political vendetta.

SRK, Aishwarya Rai top contenders to replace Amitabh Bachchan on KBC: StudyAccording to a recent study conducted among fans, actors Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai are the top picks to replace megastar Amitabh Bachchan on his game show Kaun Banega Crorepati.

TV star Disha Vakani was told not to scream during labour: Gayatri Mantra helpedDisha Vakani, famed for her role as Dayaben in TMKOC, opened up about her use of the Gayatri Mantra during the birth of her daughter, Stuti.

Louis Tomlinson on first India visit, solo career, Lollapalooza, love for Indian food | Exclusive Former One Direction member Louis Tomlinson finally arrives in India! In this exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, he talks about his long-awaited visit, his excitement for Lollapalooza, and his deep love for Indian food (yes, he tried butter chicken!).

Daredevil Born Again breaks streaming records with 7.5 million views Latest Marvel series, Daredevil Born Again, has set a new streaming record with 7.5 million views in just five days. The series marks the return of Charlie Cox as Daredevil, alongside a mix of returning and new cast members.

general news.headline: Baloch insurgents who hijacked train killed, 21 passengers dead: Pak ArmyThe Pakistan Army said all 33 Baloch insurgents who hijacked a train in Balochistan have been eliminated, and all the hostages were freed after an intense military operation.

Karnataka withdraws CID probe into Ranya Rao gold smuggling caseThe CID probe into the state police's role in the gold smuggling case involving Kannada actor Ranya Rao was withdrawn by the Karnataka government on Wednesday.

Trump hopes for Ukraine ceasefire as US officials head to Russia for talksWhile Ukraine has agreed to the US-proposed 30-day ceasefire plan, Russia has stated that it is still "studying" the proposal and is awaiting a briefing from the US regarding the plan.
Return of Sunita Williams delayed again as SpaceX reschedules rocket launchThe reason for the scrub suggests that SpaceX and Nasa could try to launch again in the coming days.

After Shashi Tharoor's Kerala praise, now a selfie with Pinarayi VijayanCongress MP Shashi Tharoor shared selfies with Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and Governor Rajendra Arlekar during a dinner in Delhi. The post comes weeks after his praise for the Left government upset Congress leaders.

IT Minister welcomes Starlink to India, later deletes the tweetA day after Jio and Airtel announced partnership with Elon Musk's Starlink satellite internet system, IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw welcomed the service in India with a tweet. While this gave a hint that government approval for Starlink, a service run by SpaceX, would come soon, the minister later deleted the tweet.

Trump vows further tariffs as EU, Canada counter those already imposedTrump said he would impose additional penalties if the EU follows through with its plan to enact counter tariffs on some US goods next month.

Sambhal's Jama Masjid among 10 mosques to be covered during Holi processionIn Uttar Pradesh's Sambhal, 10 mosques, including the historic Jama Masjid, will be covered with plastic sheets and tarpaulins that will fall along the route of a Holi procession.

Aamir Khan discusses Andaz Apna Apna 2 with Salman Khan at his birthday bashAamir Khan celebrated his 60th birthday with a gathering at his home, attended by Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan. India Today Digital exclusively learnt that Aamir and Salman, along with director Rajkumar Santoshi, discussed Andaz Apna Apna and the possibility of a sequel.
Mark Carney to take oath as Canada's 24th Prime Minister on FridayGovernor General Mary Simon will preside over the swearing-in of Carney and his Cabinet ministers on Friday at 11 am local time.

Airtel, Jio to bring Starlink to India, but hold off on spending just yetAirtel and Reliance Jio have signed a deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink services to India. However, the rollout of these services still depend on regulatory approvals. So when will the services roll out in India? This article has all the details.

Kanpur ACP Mohsin Khan, accused of sexual harassment by IIT-scholar, suspendedThe action came after a report filed into the case by the Special Investigation Team (SIT). The Kanpur Police Commissioner sent the report to the state government.

Kim So-hyun's relationship with Kim Sae-ron confirmed by Dispatch. DetailsA news report by Dispatch shed light on the controversy surrounding Kim Soo-hyun and Kim Sae-ron's alleged past relationship and the financial and emotional turmoil Kim Sae-ron faced, which might have led up to her tragic death.

Two Telangana journalists arrested over alleged defamatory video on Revanth ReddyHyderabad Cyber Crime Police arrested two journalists over an alleged defamatory video targeting Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy. The FIR was filed by a Congress leader, citing social unrest concerns. Journalist Revathi and reporter Sandhya face multiple charges under IT laws.

IITs, JNU among 9 Indian institutes in top-50 spots in QS subject-wise rankingsNine Indian universities secured positions in the top 50 of the QS subject-wise rankings, with IITs, IIMs, and JNU featuring, though some saw a drop in ranking compared to last year.

BJP sweeps Haryana civic polls, breaches Congress's Rohtak strongholdHaryana Municipal Corporation Election Results 2025: The BJP's mayoral candidates won nine of the 10 municipal corporations, including Rohtak - the bastion of Congress stalwart Bhupinder Hooda.

Panchayat actor Durgesh Kumar 'struggling' despite hit projects, spending 25 yearsActor Durgesh Kumar, known for his roles in Panchayat and Laapataa Ladies, shared that he still struggles to find significant roles despite his success. He said that he still has to chase casting directors for audition despite recognition and spending 25 years in the industry.

4 dead, 2 others injured in Dehradun hit-and-run case; search for accused onThe incident happened near the Sai Temple on the Rajpur Road where the driver of the car lost control and ran the vehicle over people walking by the side of the road as well as a few motorists.

DK Shivakumar to discuss DMK's anti-delimitation meeting with party high commandTamil Nadu Minister Ponnumudi and Rajya Sabha member MM Abdulla met DK Shivakumar and Siddaramaiah in Bengaluru on Wednesday and invited them to the anti-delimitation meeting in Chennai on March 22.

Crime Patrol-inspired murder: Man in love with sister-in law murders her husbandMadhya Pradesh police arrested a man for murdering his brother-in-law out of one-sided love for his sister-in-law. Inspired by crime shows, he tried to mislead the investigation but was caught through CCTV and phone records.

From the India Today archives (2015) | The long chase of Lalit ModiVanuatu ordering the cancellation of Modi's passport again spotlights the long-drawn Indian efforts to apprehend the former IPL chief for alleged financial irregularities

Case registered against 8 for attacking RSS worker with machete in KeralaThe RSS worker, identified as Shaju, was attacked on his way to a temple festival and sustained injuries to his head and hands.

Pakistan player Talha Waheed smashes record for most serves in a minutePakistan's Talha Waheed etched his name in the Guinness Book of World Records for registering most tennis serves in a minute. He broke American John Perry's record from 2019.

Delhi government starts withdrawing AAP's cases against Centre, Lt GovernorIn the interest of constitutional harmony involving the Delhi government, Centre and the LG office, it has been decided to withdraw all such cases by filing appropriate applications before the courts concerned.

Want to watch 'Moana 2' at home? Here's how & when it hits Disney+After making waves in theatres, Moana 2 is finally coming to Disney+! The long-awaited sequel will be availbale for streaming on Wednesday.

Aamir Khan discusses Andaz Apna Apna 2 with Salman Khan at his birthday bashAamir Khan celebrated his 60th birthday with a gathering at his home, attended by Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan. India Today Digital exclusively learnt that Aamir and Salman, along with director Rajkumar Santoshi, discussed Andaz Apna Apna and the possibility of a sequel.

Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan visit Aamir Khan ahead of his 60th birthdayThe three Khans reunited ahead of Aamir Khan's 60th birthday. Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan arrived at Aamir Khan's residence on Aamir Khan's 60th birthday eve. They came with heavy security. While Salman Khan's photos were captured by paparazzi, Shah Rukh Khan avoided them by putting black shield on his windows.

Taylor Swift's iHeartRadio moment: 'Tour of the Century' honour comes with a special surpriseTaylor Swift's iHeartRadio tribute includes an exclusive Eras Tour performance from opening night. She's also nominated for 10 awards, including one with Travis Kelce.

sports.headline: Eagles and Vikings make big moves in NFL free agencyPhiladelphia Eagles will go through a major overhaul after winning Super Bowl LIX.

Mumbai Indians IPL 2025 Complete Schedule: Full MI Fixtures, Venues, Match DatesThe five-time champions Mumbai Indians will enter the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) to reclaim their old glory. Here's the complete schedule of Mumbai Indians for IPL 2025:

March Madness selection committee faces SEC overload in bracketThe NCAA selection committee will have some juggling to do before the bracket comes out Sunday to keep March Madness from looking like an extension of the Southeastern Conference's regular season.

NFL: Bills re-sign Hamlin. Buffalo add Ogunjobi to 1-year dealSafety Damar Hamlin is returning to Buffalo, and the Bills also continued restocking their defensive front by agreeing to sign tackle Larry Ogunjobi on Wednesday.

Kobe Bryant's former players remember the NBA legendKobe Bryant's former basketball players recall their time with the basketball legend on the fifth anniversary of his death.

Puja on the pitch: Special prayer marks start of KKR's training at Eden GardensIPL 2025: Defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders began their training camp at Eden Gardens, Kolkata with a special puja. Captain Ajinkya Rahane and Eden Gardens curator Sujan Mukherjee performed the rituals on Wednesday.

NBA: Milwaukee star Junior Bridgeman dies at 71Junior Bridgeman, a basketball standout, starred for the NBA's Milwaukee Bucks and then launched an even more successful career as a businessman with stakes in restaurants, publishing and the Bucks franchise, died at 71 on Tuesday.

WPL Eliminator: Mumbai Indians vs Gujarat Giants live streaming and match guideMumbai Indians and Gujarat Giants are set to take on each other in the Eliminator fixture of the Women's Premier League 2025 in Mumbai. The winner will face Delhi Capitals in the final on March 15.
NFL: Michael Pierce announces retirementBaltimore Ravens defensive tackle Michael Pierce announced his retirement Wednesday after nine seasons in the NFL.

MS Dhoni sings with wife Sakshi, poses with Gambhir at Pant's sister's weddingMS Dhoni was seen grooving to a popular Bollywood song alongside his wife, Sakshi. The former India captain and Gautam Gambhir also posed together with Rishabh Pant's sister and her husband in Mussoorie.

Captain Ajinkya Rahane and Eden Gardens curator Sujan Mukherjee performed the rituals on Wednesday.

NFL: Michael Pierce announces retirementBaltimore Ravens defensive tackle Michael Pierce announced his retirement Wednesday after nine seasons in the NFL.

MS Dhoni sings with wife Sakshi, poses with Gambhir at Pant's sister's weddingMS Dhoni was seen grooving to a popular Bollywood song alongside his wife, Sakshi. The former India captain and Gautam Gambhir also posed together with Rishabh Pant's sister and her husband in Mussoorie.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
